column2: Easterly Government Properties, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust, which engages in the acquisition, development, and management of commercial properties that are leased to U.S. Government agencies. The company is headquartered in Washington, Washington Dc and currently employs 32 full-time employees. The firm focuses on the acquisition, development and management of Class A commercial properties that are leased to the United States Government agencies. The firm leases its properties to such agencies through the United States General Services Administration (GSA). The operations of the Company are carried on primarily through Easterly Government Properties, LP and the subsidiaries of the Operating Partnership. As of September 17, 2018, it had 64 operating properties in the United States, including properties that are leased primarily to the United States Government tenant agencies and properties that are entirely leased to private tenants. Its properties are encompassing approximately five million square feet in the aggregate. In addition, the Company had three property under development as of September 17, 2018.
